sentences.en: a dead tree that has been colonized by ants
sentences.cn: 被蚂蚁占据的一棵死树

sentences.en: Both acid - reducing drugs can make the stomach a more hospitable place for bacteria to colonize.
sentences.cn: 两种抑酸药都可以使胃环境变得更适于细菌生存.

sentences.en: Colonize constantly, using the money produced by your Planets to buy supplies for your Planets.
sentences.cn: 不断地拓殖发展你的行星, 用你的行星生产的钱,买供应品给你的行星.

sentences.en: Conclusions - Bacteria can colonize cardiac electrophysiological devices without clinical signs of infection.
sentences.cn: 结论 — 细菌可聚集在心脏电生理装置而不出现感染表现.

sentences.en: First, upgrade your hull to level 15, then colonize a planet.
sentences.cn: 首先, 将自己的船升到第15级, 然后拓殖行星.

sentences.en: In order to seek larger development space, Taiji computer corporation Ltd must colonize some new realm.
sentences.cn: 为寻求更大的发展空间, 太极计算机股份有限公司必须在原有业务领域基础上拓展新的空间.

sentences.en: Iraq will rebel against their evil intentions to colonize it and to wield influence in it.
sentences.cn: 伊拉克将要反抗他们有害的意图去开拓殖民地和动员影响力.

sentences.en: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentences.cn: 它不会传染或寄居于死的或干的植体组织.

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: The presence and availability of water also affect the ability of microorganisms to colonize foods.
sentences.cn: 水的存在和可利用率也影响微生物在食品中的繁殖能力.

sentences.en: The result indicated that strain B 47 could colonize in both soil and tomato organ.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,枯草芽孢杆菌菌株B47可在土壤和番茄植株中定殖.

words.tran_cn: 殖民主义者的；奉行殖民主义的
殖民者；殖民地居民；移民
殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民

trans.tran_cn: 建立殖民地，（动物）大批繁殖，（植物）大批生长
trans.tran_en: to establish political control over an area or over another country, and send your citizens there to settle

trans.tran_cn: 聚居于， 大批生长于； 开拓殖民地， 移居于
trans.tran_en: to establish political control over an area or over another country, and send your citizens there to settle
